nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE EXPECTED TO TURN TO THE NORTHWEST AND STRENGTHEN SOON... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHWESTERN HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary:
...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE EXPECTED TO TURN TO THE NORTHWEST AND STRENGTHEN SOON... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHWESTERN HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
 As of 11:00 AM HST Fri Aug 30
 the center of Hone was located near 21.9, -175.9
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
